name: ASSOCIATION OF POSITIVE PEOPLE FOR LIVING EXCELLENCE (APPLE)
briefDescription: APPLE- Association of Positive People for Living Excellence got registered under the Societies Registration Act 35 of 2001 society number 348 on 15th September 2003. Positive people established the Network for the people living with HIV/AIDS in West Godavari Dist. It initiated its activities on 29th November 2003 from Eluru, West Godavari Dist.APPLE is a community based non-profit organization formed by for people living with HIV in West Godavari. The primary mission of APPLE is to enhance their enabling environment for PLWHA in West Godavari.  The fundamental principle guiding the work of APPLE is the centrality of PLWHA in decision-making processes that affect their lives.  Consequently, APPLE is organized and managed by people living

address: Near Vangaya Gudem, Beside Electrical Sub Station.
